snippet: Investment returns on college and university endowments declined by an average of 0.3 percent last year, down from 19.2 percent in fiscal 2011, according to a new study.
abstract: Study by Commonfund Institute and National Assn of College and University Business Officers says on average, investment returns on college and university endowments declined by 0.3 percent in 2012, down from 19.2 percent in fiscal 2011.
lead_paragraph: Investment returns on college and university endowments declined by an average of 0.3 percent last year, down from 19.2 percent in fiscal 2011, according to a new study.

headline.seo: Study Confirms Drop in College Endowment Returns
